<Text: "Flatline" is a song by American rapper B.o.B, initially released on SoundCloud in January 2016.>

Text: Flatline (B.o.B song):  In addition to dissing Tyson and expressing belief in a flat earth, the song's lyrics also include other conspiracy theories, including Holocaust denial, "mirror lizards", and the belief that Freemasons are indoctrinating young people.
